title: Five-Star Byron Bay Hinterland Manor Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Escape the everyday with a boutique stay at the five-star Victoria’s at Ewingsdale - a stately country manor tucked away in Byron Bay’s pristine Hinterland. Inspired by Tuscan and French colonial architecture, Victoria’s at Ewingsdale rests majestically amid four acres of beautifully manicured gardens and offers a peaceful country escape just six kilometres west of Byron Bay township. Guests will be welcomed with a bottle of sparkling wine and a fresh fruit platter. Plus, wake-up each day to a freshly prepared continental breakfast and satisfy your sweet tooth with daily afternoon tea.

⏱Buy now, book later: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: 207 Balraith Ln, Byron Bay Ewingsdale NSW 2481

title: Romantic Country Manor Escape in Beautiful Byron Bay
description: Indulge in a slice of country manor charm amid the coastal beauty and tranquil hinterlands of Byron Bay at the luxurious Victoria's at Ewingsdale, located just a 10-minute drive from the beach. Spend four days/three nights in an elegant Garden View Room and enjoy daily continental breakfasts, daily afternoon tea, a tropical fruit platter, spa credits and savings on local experiences for two.
location_description: Victoria's At Ewingsdale Byron Bay OLD
offer_address: 207 Balraith Ln, Byron Bay Ewingsdale NSW 2481
